text.text_translated: The story is about a brave girl. Her name is Katniss Everdeen. She is sixteen years old. Her father died in an accident. He worked in a place under the ground. So, she has to get food for her family. She hunts in the woods around area 12 with her friend Gale. She is very good with a bow and arrow. A bow is a tool. You use it to send arrows far away. Her younger sister, Prim, is chosen to be a 'tribute'. A 'tribute' is a person. This person has to fight for sport. Katniss offers to go instead of her sister. The other 'tribute' from area 12 is a boy named Peeta. Soon, her feelings for him are difficult and hard to understand.

best_attempt.text_translated: The story is about a brave girl. Her name is Katniss Everdeen. She is sixteen years old. Her father died in an accident in a mine. So, she has to find food for her family. She hunts in the woods around District 12 with her friend Gale. She is very good at shooting arrows. Her younger sister, Prim, is chosen to be a 'tribute'. Katniss offers to go instead of her sister. The other 'tribute' from District 12 is a boy named Peeta. Soon, her relationship with him becomes difficult.
